overview: 'A Wise Fool' is a 56-minute Documentary about four teens who chose to kidnap, rob, and bury a couple alive. Death Row inmate, Michael Jackson, the master mind, is on death row. Our cameras captured his "exclusive" first time confession. The Victims daughter shared a powerful story concerning her mother's faith that encouraged her to forgive, but the consequences remain...They are fatal and irreversible.
title: A Wise Fool
